words.definition: To go from one place to another.

example.en: We want to travel to Italy.

words.definition: The place you are going to.

example.en: Paris is a popular tourist destination.
I have a full itinerary for the trip.

words.definition: A piece of paper or digital file that allows you to travel.
words.arabic_definition: ورقة أو ملف رقمي يسمح لك بالسفر.

example.en: I bought a ticket to New York.

words.definition: A document required for international travel.

example.en: Make sure to carry your passport.
I applied for a tourist visa.
example.ar: تقدمت بطلب للحصول على تأشيرة سياحية.

example.en: The travel agency arranged our trip.

words.definition: A booking for a trip or accommodation.

example.en: I made a hotel reservation online.

words.definition: Bags or suitcases used for travel.
A policy that covers travel-related emergencies.
words.arabic_definition: بوليصة تغطي الحالات الطارئة أثناء السفر.

example.en: I bought travel insurance for my trip.
